definition: Bank of China/abbr. for 中國銀行|中国银行[Zhong1 guo2 Yin2 hang2]
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: Another office building was opened in 2001 as BOC Centre.
sentences.chinese: 另一新办公大楼奥海中心于2001年改为中银中心。

sentences.english: The note is on the topmost shelf.
sentences.chinese: 中银大厦在香港是最高的。

sentences.english: This Newsletter is issued by BOCI-Prudential Asset Management Limited.
sentences.chinese: 此通讯由中银国际英国保诚资产管理有限公司出版。

sentences.english: The Bank of China Tower is over there.
sentences.chinese: 中银大厦是香港的标志性建筑之一。

sentences.english: Bank of China is topmost in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 中银大厦在香港是最高的。

sentences.english: The silver content in silver catalyst was determined by Volhard method.
sentences.chinese: 采用佛尔哈德法测银催化剂中银含量。

sentences.english: The partition of silver in ores shows grading with level.
sentences.chinese: 矿石中银的配分随着标高变化呈递变现象。

sentences.english: The technics of distilling silver from waste electronic device by two step electrolysis method was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了两步电解法回收废电子元器件中银的工艺条件。
